title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Skills: Integrated Multilingual Approach (IPA)-Based Social Sector Decision-Making

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: 85% or more of learners complete a language repertoire analysis report through a four-stage reflective cycle.
Learners acquire and utilize 150 or more specialized social sector terms through translation activities using multidimensional instructional methods.
In 4-person collaborative projects, learners apply the IPA-5DIF framework to develop three or more intercultural communication scenarios.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
